Today is the first day of the rest of your life.
Your life is ending one minute at a time. If you were to die tomorrow, what would you do today?
It is never to late to become what you never were.
Until our most fantastic demands are met, fantasy will always be at war with reality.
The revolution will come when hackers meet political activists...
The planet is not dying, it is being killed. And those killing it have names and addresses.
Res publica non dominetur.
"From each according to their ability, to each according to their need." - Karl Marx
The future will only contain what we put into it now.
Commute, work, commute, sleep...
In a society that abolishes adventure, the only adventure is in abolishing society.
Run, comrade, the old world is behind you!
Nature created neither servants nor masters. I want neither to rule or be ruled.
By stopping our machines together we will demonstrate their weakness.
I take my desires for reality because I believe in the reality of my desires.
Practice wishful thinking.
Be realistic, demand the impossible.
We refuse the role assigned to us: we will not be trained as police dogs
Going through the motions kills the emotions
Constraints imposed on pleasure excite the pleasure of living without constraints
The economy is wounded - I hope it dies!
How sad to love money
No freedom for the enemies of freedom
To hell with boundaries
Seekers are offered clues all the time from the world of spirit. Ordinary people call these clues coincidences.
It is my job to corrupt young people with the contageous, infectious idea of individual freedom.

"Democracy is the only system that persists in asking the powers that be whether they are the powers that ought to be."  - Sydney J. Harris

Democracy is being allowed to vote for the candidate you dislike least.
"The problem with political jokes is they get elected." - Henry Cate, VII

"Under democracy one party always devotes its chief energies to trying to prove that the other party is unfit to rule - and both commonly succeed, and are right." - H.L. Mencken

Happiness isn't something you experience; its something you remember.

Information wants to be free.
The smaller the mind the greater the conceit.
When they discover the center of the universe, a lot of people will be disappointed to discover they are not it.
The world tolerates conceit from those who are successful, but not from anybody else.
We are so vain that we even care for the opinion of those we don't care for.
For God hates utterly The bray of bragging tongues.
The greatest of faults, I should say, is to be conscious of none.
The less their ability, the more their conceit.
Great ability develops and reveals itself increasingly with every new assignment.
Natural ability without education has more often attained to glory and virtue than education without natural ability.
Martyrdom... is the only way in which a man can become famous without ability.
I know of no more encouraging fact than the unquestioned ability of a man to elevate his life by conscious endeavor.
Ability will never catch up with the demand for it.

Nerds don't just happen to dress informally. They do it too consistently. Consciously or not, they dress informally as a prophylactic measure against stupidity.

They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
The big lie of computer security is that security improves by imposing complex passwords on users. In real life, people write down anything they can't remember. Security is increased by designing for the way humans actually behave. -Jakob Nielsen
Any transition serious enough to alter your definition of self will require not just small adjustments in your way of living and thinking but a full-on metamorphosis.
There is nothing like returning to a place that remains unchanged to find the ways in which you yourself have altered.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Turbulence is life force. It is opportunity. Lets love turbulence and use it for change.

For every action there is an equal and opposite government program.
Government is too big and too important to be left to the politicians.
Every decent man is ashamed of the government he lives under.

I believe that all government is evil, and that trying to improve it is largely a waste of time.
Whenever you have an efficient government you have a dictatorship.
You will find that the State is the kind of organization which, though it does big things badly, does small things badly, too.
Sure there are dishonest men in local government. But there are dishonest men in national government too.
Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business.
It is dangerous to be right when the government is wrong.
I dont make jokes. I just watch the government and report the facts.
Theres no trick to being a humorist when you have the whole government working for you.
